what: Interface with the ClinicalOmicsDB API, Allowing for Easy Data Downloading and Importing
title: Interface with the ClinicalOmicsDB API, Allowing for Easy Data Downloading and Importing
text: R package interface ClinicalOmicsDB API. Can used download data analysis, directly load study information dataframe exploration. Designed structure https://r-pkgs.org/.

title: Interface with the ClinicalOmicsDB API, Allowing for Easy Data Downloading and Importing
text: install latest stable release, run can install development version clinicalomicsdbR GitHub : See Examples see use.

title: Interface with the ClinicalOmicsDB API, Allowing for Easy Data Downloading and Importing
text: hostname - base URL website containing ClinicalOmicsDB API. change running custom service. study_list - list containing studies filtered filter() function.

title: Interface with the ClinicalOmicsDB API, Allowing for Easy Data Downloading and Importing
text: new() - Create new clinicalomicsdbR object. Needed function filter(drugs, cancers) - filters studies matching provided arugments. drugs list can individual drugs combinations. See ClinicalOmicsDB website options. cancers can contain multiple cancers. download(output_dir) - downloads studies filter() output_dir. output_dir optional, defaults clindb dataframe() - loads studies filter() list, column study_list contains names studies df contains list study data information. dataframe_from_id(study_id) - loads study id study_id dataframe downlaod_from_id(study_id, output_dir) - downsloads study id study_id folder output_dir. output_dir defaults clindb See examples information use.

title: Interface with the ClinicalOmicsDB API, Allowing for Easy Data Downloading and Importing
text: Filters studies used rituximab ipilimumab downloads studies folder. Notes: output_dir optional. Defaults clindb.
code: library(clinicalomicsdbR)  clinicalomicsdbR$new()$filter(drugs = c("ipilimumab", "rituximab"))$download(output_dir = "studies") # downloads all files #> [1] "Filtered to 4 studies." #> [1] "Downloading study Gide_Cell_2019_pembro_ipi.csv from https://bcm.box.com/shared/static/swf5fywqcqmf75600g7v8irt2a9agnqo.csv" #> [1] "Downloading study VanAllen_antiCTLA4_2015.csv from https://bcm.box.com/shared/static/v0sphd7ht487qk96xbwjokgkbkjpexom.csv" #> [1] "Downloading study Gide_Cell_2019_nivo_ipi.csv from https://bcm.box.com/shared/static/jwv108f6cy4kvyeqer95jdugla53m1zt.csv" #> [1] "Downloading study GSE35935.csv from https://bcm.box.com/shared/static/8icr4i6gbbp6lgd01iscbss4v7lnj6c5.csv" #> [1] "Downloaded 4 studies."

title: Interface with the ClinicalOmicsDB API, Allowing for Easy Data Downloading and Importing
text: Filters studies used rituximab ipilimumab gets data frame. Notes: output_dir optional. Defaults clindb.
code: library(clinicalomicsdbR)  res <- clinicalomicsdbR$new()$filter(drugs = c("ipilimumab", "rituximab"))$dataframe(); # downloads all files #> [1] "Filtered to 4 studies." #> [1] "Getting dataframe of study Gide_Cell_2019_pembro_ipi.csv from https://bcm.box.com/shared/static/swf5fywqcqmf75600g7v8irt2a9agnqo.csv" #> [1] "Getting dataframe of study VanAllen_antiCTLA4_2015.csv from https://bcm.box.com/shared/static/v0sphd7ht487qk96xbwjokgkbkjpexom.csv" #> [1] "Getting dataframe of study Gide_Cell_2019_nivo_ipi.csv from https://bcm.box.com/shared/static/jwv108f6cy4kvyeqer95jdugla53m1zt.csv" #> [1] "Getting dataframe of study GSE35935.csv from https://bcm.box.com/shared/static/8icr4i6gbbp6lgd01iscbss4v7lnj6c5.csv"  for (study in res[["study_list"]]) {   print(ncol(res[["df"]][[study]])) } #> [1] 15194 #> [1] 15059 #> [1] 17145 #> [1] 20321
